filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello 同情家族歡迎收聽 Look Back Sunday在這個節目John老師會彙整過去不同國家與主題的熱門跟讀文章讓你可以在15分鐘內吸收最精華的世界史詩曲文Let's get right to it!
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: The Saudis are obviously engaged in reputation laundering, greenwashing,
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: in an attempt to make people forget about the atrocities their regime has perpetrated.It's less clear what motivated the PGA.Did it consider the LIV series flawed?Not a proper golf tour?Was it attempting to squash competition?Or was the problem with the LIV series' sponsors?PGA attendees surveyed by Pro Golf Weekly were in no doubt.An overwhelming majority attributed Michelson's exclusion
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: to media slash cancel culture.And I hope they're right.I mean, if getting paid big bucks to provide favorable PR to a regime that deals with critical journalists by killing them and dismembering them with a bone saw doesn't warrant cancellation, what does?And yet Michelson and others were willing to provide that PR.So if you ask me, the real story here isn't that the PGA may or may not have found a line it won't cross.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: It's that so many members of the American elite evidently have no such lines.What explains the rise of sellout culture?Tax cuts may have played a role.Selling your soul becomes more attractive when you get to keep more of the proceeds.Soaring income inequality may inspire envy.A desire to keep up with the super elite.And there is surely a process of normalization.Everyone else is selling out.So why shouldn't I join the party?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: Kids used to look up to public figures,sport stars in particular as role models.Do they still?Can they?Given what public figures will do if the checks are big enough.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: I'm not sure.I'm not sure.I'm not sure.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_回顧星期天LBS - 高爾夫相關時事趣聞 All about 2022 golf.json

chunks.chunk_text: 他逃脱了汽油,失去了六次槍擊。一年多前,一名舊的足球員,不僅是贏了一場大冠军賽,卻是一件很少考慮到的事。那時依舊是當時很多足球員在他們的中四十歲時,在足球世界上踢了一圈,在他們的五十歲時,在足球世界上踢了一圈,在足球世界上踢了一圈,
